page.title: 01BROADHURST KENNELS,THORNSETT
page.content: Many years ago on Broadhurst Edge farm there was a man called Mr. Brocklehurst.At that time the farm was very big because he used to have cattle and he held auctions at the front of the house. Later on the farm was sold with a small plot of land so we only have 25 acres now.In May 1978 we opened the kennels. In the dog house we have eleven kennels and twelve cat pens.In 1980 we moved the cats into the stables and made the cattery there.We now have a small dogs kennels with thirteen more kennels.We open from 9.00a.m. until 12.00 and 4.00p.m. until 6.00p.m.We take all kinds of dogs and cats. My mum feeds the animals every afternoon at 5.00p.m.She gives them vitamins and meat.Dogs that are fussy usually have meat and biscuits.
